live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41655.summary: Customers in the Sahara Heights area of Port Alberni are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41655.title: Sep 11 - Port Alberni (Sahara Heights surroundings) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
